Class Character

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
combat.Combatant, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero, Monster
public abstract class Character extends Object implements combat.Combatant, Serializable
Abstract base class representing a character in the game. Implements the Combatant interface and provides shared attributes and behaviors for all playable and non-playable characters, including health, will points, strength, weapon handling, and combat actions.
See Also:
